text: The Earth is roughly spherical according to centuries of astronomical observations.
Vaccines are safe and effective; extensive studies show no link to autism.
The Moon landing occurred on July 20, 1969, as part of NASA's Apollo 11 mission.
Climate change is driven primarily by greenhouse gas emissions from human activity.
COVID-19 vaccines prevent severe illness and hospitalization.
5G mobile technology does not cause COVID-19; this is misinformation.
Smoking increases the risk of lung cancer and heart disease.
Barack Obama served as the 44th president of the United States from 2009 to 2017.
Water boils at 100Â°C under standard atmospheric pressure.
Earth orbits around the Sun once every 365 days.
Artificial intelligence systems learn from data patterns, not human emotions.
The human body requires oxygen for cellular respiration.
Elon Musk is the CEO of Tesla and SpaceX.
Albert Einstein developed the theory of relativity.
Plastic pollution poses a threat to marine ecosystems.
Renewable energy sources include solar, wind, and hydropower.
Diabetes is caused by problems with insulin production or response.
Vaccination helps prevent the spread of infectious diseases.
The Great Wall of China is over 13,000 miles long.
The Amazon rainforest produces about 20% of Earth's oxygen.
